name: SOCCER RECCOS
description:
A rewind-soccer-like game for the Brackeys GameJam 2020.2

Currently needs 2 gamepads controllers, this is a two player game. Keyboard still not supported.

You need to score 10 goals to win the game, the ball rewind its position after a few seconds, and if the ball hits you after a throw you go back in time a few seconds. Strageties can be made with the simoultaneous movement of two characters for player.
